name: Angler World Championship
description:
Play as the legendary Grillmaster in this pretty short point and click! You're trapped in a scary house? Or is it a warehouse? Whatever it is (we never explain) you gotta get out!

FEATURES:

You can kiss people! (Two people)

You can walk around!

Best experienced with the sound on.

Made by @clankyshonk

(PRO TIP: DON'T TAB OUT OF THE GAME WHILE YOU'RE PLAYING IT OR IT TOTALLY SHITS ITSELF I THINK AND IT CRASHES!!!!!!!!!)

also this game is Windows only sorry :(
